amendment.description: Amendment extends the public comment period from 90 days to 120 days.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 112-213 to extend the public comment period from 90 days to 120 days.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 346 - 74 (Roll no. 736).

action.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
